description: Minimally processed meat and poultry products \\n*Fish
full_summary:
# EC095-240005 - Request for Standing Offers for RMSO Meat, Fish, Poultry

## Reference Information

* Solicitation Number: `WS4479738170`
* Publication Date: March 25, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: [4:00 PM EST, April 18, 2024]

## Tender Details

* Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for a total of two (2) Lots:
	+ Lot 1: Minimally processed meat and poultry products
	+ Lot 2: Fish
* Opening to all economically responsible suppliers
* The selected Stand-by Offerors (SBOs) will be expected to supply the following end-user entities:
	+ Department of National Defence
	+ Department of Fisheries and Oceans
	+ Correctional Service of Canada
* The contract will have a duration of one (1) year.

## Tender Requirements

* Suppliers must be an economically responsible supplier and meet the admissibility criteria in the solicitation document.
* Suppliers must comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the solicitation document.
* As per FSRA (Financial Services Regulatory Authority), all goods and services relating to this RSO must meet all applicable Canada Cyber and Digital Business laws (CCDB) and related regulations

## Government Agreements under which the award of this contract will be made available

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

## Delivery Regions

* Nova Scotia
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* New Brunswick

## Awards Information

* The Standing Offers will be awarded under the accommodated bid evaluation method.
* Suppliers will be selected based on the lowest price.

## Stakeholder Information

For more information and/or to lodge a Tender, send an email to [tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or visit the Ariba Bid invitation (`https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19203290?extsite=MTkyMDMyOTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==`). 
We hope you made it to the end, thanks for the feedback and follow-ups! Have a question or a request? Feel free to send us
